name: Minion, I have to take a leak.
name_original: Minion, I have to take a leak.
description:
Entry for LD#33: You are the Monster.

The boss has to take a leak. I guess he left me in charge.

Hope nothing stupid happens while he is gone...

Defend the Boss's stuff! Or Else!

Be the BOSS! (At least while he's taking a leak)

Hope you don't get fired!
